dependencies: Sphinx==4.5.0 and sphinx-* packages (requirements.txt; documentation tooling)
deployment_relevant_files: Dockerfile (AWS Lambda container image; CMD main.handler)
main.py (Lambda handler and data pipeline logic)
architectural_resources: AWS Lambda function (container-based) (inferred from Dockerfile base image public.ecr.aws/lambda/python:3.11 and handler signature in main.py)
Container image registry for Lambda image (e.g., AWS ECR) (implied by ReadMe.md instructions, though Terraform files are not present in this repo snapshot)
Tuya Cloud API integration (tinytuya.Cloud; requires TUYA_APIKEY/TUYA_APISECRET/TUYA_APISREGION env vars in main.py)
InfluxDB 2.x instance (docker-compose.yaml service influxdb; main.py writes to InfluxDB via INFLUXDB_URL/TOKEN/ORG/BUCKET env vars)
Grafana instance (docker-compose.yaml service grafana; dashboard.json provided)
Persistent volumes for InfluxDB and Grafana data (docker-compose.yaml volumes influxdb-data, grafana-data)
Network connectivity from Lambda to InfluxDB endpoint (implied by ReadMe.md: InfluxDB hosted on VM with public internet access)
